content: The game was a great read the characters are very well written and the choices felt impactfull but the story felt a little too short for my liking if it was a little more fleshed out and longer I would have given it a 5
This is the best game that I ever played, it makes you use your imagination at full throttle !!!!! I recommend that everyone get this game !!!!!!

The premise is cool, but it is more reading then choice. And the choices all lead to the same thing, really you only get to decide how you feel not how the game actually goes. And if you try to be evil, the wording will still be the same if you weren't evil(ie, act like a scared weakling) which makes no sense considering the choice is (I'm just here to kill) So there is no real choice. And it's very wordy, there's really only one possible path. At least it's good writing...sorta

I don't usually play these games, more hands on. All I needed to c was the word Mecha. It is obviously inspired by gundam but it has a lot of original aspects that make it stand alone. I really like it that the story makes you a veteran fighter from the start. This story is not lacking in mecha descriptions which I love! Would have loved to see picture blueprints of the mecha and battleships. PLEASE MAKE ANOTHER MECHA STORY PLEASE!!
Very fun, good writing, good amount of choice and replayability.
I love the story and the game mechanics of the game. I hope there's more mecha or space related interactive novel to be released.
A good mecha take never hurt anyone, except for all those bad guys
I liked playing this game a lot üòÄ though characters aren't made deep enough to worry about them the story is really good
Really wish you'd make a second one I've been waiting forever!!!

Pretty good game. Characters are pretty weak, but story has a lot of action and goid repercussion balance. Romance is... Confusing and randomly balanced. Also, there is no stat balanced play through. You absolutely must specialize in weapons, tactics, and personality. Otherwise it ends very badly.

Story is good and reminds me of Gundam. I have fun reading this. It kept me up all night until morning. One minor complaint from me; the requirements to romance Hawkins. I have to restart so much to the point of punching my pillow. For me, to get Hawkins, I have to either lose the ability to get my hand back, or give in to "it". I wish there was a guide on how to get Hawkins and able to get your hand back. I retry so much, but to no avail. Idc anymore now I FINALLY got good end. Anime ja nai!!

Fantastic story filled to the brim with brutally tough decision making. The amount of replay value here is immense. It certainly takes inspiration from Gundam specifically the U.C. but it handles it exceedingly well and turns inspiration into something refreshing and unique. If you even have a passing feeling that you might want this game don't skip out on it, couldn't reccomend this game enough.

This game is fantastically written, not only the characters and their interactions but the galaxy they live in as well. So many ways to build your character and ways to reach the end game. I've personally found 5 but I'm sure there's more. I'd buy this game twice it's so good. If the author ever works on a sequel or something in the same universe I'd throw money at it immediately. But this is definitely worth your time if you're looking for a novel where you take control. Keep up the good work!
An enjoyable experience that has multiple routes with many endings that is only strengthened by the many little choices you can make so that each run is different.

This was my first choice based reading game. This is the best of the best to me I will never uninstall!! Let me know when you make another mech game and I will throw my money at you. Love Love Love this work of beautiful fiction.
Favorite Choice game
fun and entertaining
great game, usually pick a couple from CoG and hosted. this is one of the better ones I've gotten to play keep up the good work!

It's alright, the story telling was pretty boring and felt bloated. The ending was also under welming despite the build up. The romantic elements were forgettable along with the characters. The combat could have been so much better with the right description.
mecha fun!

Honestly, I would recommend making way more good, qaulity mecha-anime-type-based science fiction choose your own adventure, create your own character stories like this, maybe make something akin to anime like Neon Genesis Evangelion, with its deep pyschological horror and eldritch space horror, end-of-the-world-as-we-know-it themes, or maybe something akin to series such as Baccano!, Naruto Shippuden or the Gundam franchise, ya know, to balance out or even rival the fantasy ones you've made.
really enjoyed it hope there is a second book
this game was super awesome and i loved it, i hope that maybe a sequel can be made soon it would be really cool
Easily worth the price, and have earned a new fan.
Nice but a little short
I love all hard work you put in this
I'm still patiently waiting for a sequel.
Enjoyed the story and characters!  I'm not much of a fan of sci-fi but this got me hooked.
love it needs a sequel asap
It was okay not good as others but wouldn't mind another book to see what happens would rate 3.5 but can't also like I said am still interested to see where the story goes
Plz make more games like this one but bigger and keep the quality of choices !More battle suits or space combats or both !Not like the heroes series that the choices doesn't really matter...:/
This story had no differentiation at all in it... As long as you made choices to have one high attribute and didn't do something completely dumb then you win pretty much.
Fairly good story line although i dont know what i paid for. There are many identical apps which are free to read so i fell kind of cheated. For the cost i expected a full on book at the very least.
It's one of the best choice games I've played
I loved the story. It really feels like you control things. My only complaint is if you put most of your skill in piloting, the interrogation scene sets up an extremely difficult ending.
Great story.please make a sequel or prequel
Great game should pay for more games like this
Turrable

I thought the overall story was very good! I liked the smooth transitioning between scenes and overall writing itself. I just didn't like the fact that you only have one set path you can commit to, due to your inability to retain all four of your skills. What you decide early on as your weakness, turns out to be what effects the story as a whole, so it felt like my choices were just fillers for an inevitable end. Other then that, amazing story.
A very fun, Gundam Wing style story. Lots of depth in the world setting. Kept me interested long enough to finish it and start back for a second read.

Enjoyed it a lot. Have replayed it twice already with very different characters.  The story is very interesting and is very well written. Likeable characters, appropriate choices and many memorable moments. I totally recommend it!
I seriously loved this game, but I've now played over 15 times and I have no idea how to get deadalus. Please, I must know
I haven't even finished this yet. But when one of the default given names is Yoshiyuki Tomino, I just burst out laughing. I definitely saw what you did there.
Love the story, some borrowed ideas, but well composed overall.
It's like being able to direct your own Gundam anime. Good story pacing and some tough choices to make. We need more of this type of games / stories.
I loved it too much
Loads of fun!
Definitely one of my favorite choice of games. I read through this story so many times to try and get my perfect ending. My 2nd time buying it for another account.
Highly recommended!

I enjoyed playing through this title but it lacks choices and fills in the time with lots of well written text. You may like it depending on what you're after. If you're a sci-fi fan than this well be grear for you no matter what.
I loved it.  Loved it loved it.
It is pretty much living in the Gundam Universe--- which I am no means a huge fan of, but I have nothing but good words and respect for this game.

I loved all the references to 70s mecha (the serial number scene had me hyped) and the choices you make have actual weight to them unlike some of CoG's gallery. Keep up the good work, if you made a sequel a la Char's Counterattack or even Z Gundam I would definitely pick it up!
great  story
Way too short and ends abruptly. It's a fifth of the length of a proper book at best.
I finished the game a few times but since the new update every time I'm supposed to get the red comet achievement I don't get it please fix if you do 5star
This is awesome. The story is great!  Is there a chance that a sequel will be made or mecha?
Wonderful
Great lots of fun to be had, with so much choices
This game is the perfect game for people who like action mixed with personality. Every character has a visible personality but most have different reasons for doing the things they do.
natasha kerensky of wolf lance? yes i am. yes... i am.
Great replay value and doesn't get too drug down by the sci fi jargon
Simple and addictive. Loved the story.
Love it wish I could find more to play
Greatly enjoyed playing through this game, even after multiple times. I only wish that there was a second installment because that would be awesome :)
PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE!!! TELL ME YOUR MAKING A SECOND INTSALLMENT!!!!????
Thoroughly enjoyed this on a slack day at work, very choose your own adventure!
I rarely play games with mechs, but when I do I immensely enjoy them. Mecha Ace is no exception. This text based game is a joy to play again and again.
Come on we all want another part in this story
Really good read and lots of interesting way's the story goes especially if you're into the space opera theme similar to Gundam

Those are the words that come to mind with this game. It is a bit linear. Though the choices feel like they matter which is very important. This is a very fun game and worth playing at least a few times.
I love the fact that this game makes you consider your choices carefully, especially on the first run.
Good story fun kept me on end of my seat make more mecha stories i'll get them all
The story was a bit predictable, but well written. Lots of fun trying out different options.

It is a good game that has quit a few really good moments and what makes it better is that all the other parts of the game is good ONLY problem I got with the game is that on all the play throughs I had I could not romance any of the love interest so fix that and make it a bit easier to romance them and I will give it a 5 star but overall it is a must buy.
Overall great game
I love it! It's quite intense in certain parts, and the fact that it's mecha, it really reminds me of the original Gundam series. Great game!
The return to check point doesn't work. If you misclick your going to need to start over.
Great game but I feel like I'm reading a story instead of playing a game. Not enough interaction compared to choice of robots.
play for a little bit, then close it and now it won't open for me again
Thought I'd break the game by being a villain. Villains win. Wow.
Its a truly amazing feat that this app ever made it to the app store. With a predictable story and absolutely horendoeus writing, I would not reccomend this Cog to anyone.
I grew up watching mecha and this game brought back the love I had for them when I was a kid
Its awsome

Except for the checkpoint system; it simply doesn't work. I try to use it and I'm taken to the status page where my stats are changed. When I return to the game I resume right where I left off. Unfortunately, there doesn't seem to be any hope for an update.
Wow
Ive been looking for somthing like this and this was amazing  i loved the story played many time to find out everything     you get sucked in quick and want to keep going  \/

Fans or Animes of mecha n gundams. Get this one. Good choices though outcomes are limited. But draws u in the story. 1 of the best game stories ever produce besides heroes rise n choice of broadsides.
The story line is awesome wish there was a continuation
Love this, however there seems to be a glitch where the return to checkpoint option doesnt do anything
Amazing game.

I love the game and the entire series it's. I am a writer by hobby and I really only have one complaint and that's just me nitpicking on something simple. The amount of times the phrase "tell-tale signs" comes up is rather ridiculous but aside from that its a perfect story game
Good but romances are impossible.  Espically blue masque

Absolutely love this game. Felt like being in an anime. Its a little more linear but still fun and your choices do matter. I wish there was a bit more in the romance department but overall lots of fun.
Fantastic! I'm going to keep replaying it to get all the possible endings.

I hope the author enjoyed making this half as much as I enjoyed playing it. It's brilliant and highly replayable . The only downside; it drains your baterry quickly so don't forget to turn the app off when you're done. Looking forward for a second installment or spin-off.
Had quite the time trying the different paths with this one.
At first I was afraid this story might be pretty gimmicky, but it's actually fairly intelligent and engrossing.
Awesome, nice mix of choice and consequence.
Decent game, but why did it use .26 gb of my data, and 1.37 gb over wifi in 8 hours?
An excellent addition to the cog series. This one is one of the best choice based games on the market. I highly recommend it.
I've bought and played all hosted games and choice of games text adventures, and to compare, while more linear with less variation, this is every bit as good as space Marine from before.
I like this one alot. :)
Great writing and story

After  dealing with the half-a**ed games that seem to have been released by COG, it nice to finally purchase one that is well worth the money. I've already played through 6 times. I f**in love it. Keep it up.
I really enjoyed this, although I felt the story was cut much to short.  Nothing was really resolved, so I hope a sequal is forthcoming.

Overall the game is well written, and well thought out. However there are a couple mistakes here and there, but nothing to bad, also seems there is a small bug where you are unable to select a choice. If those weren't around it would've been a full 5 stars.

While I enjoyed the game quite a bit, I noticed that a large portion of the storyline is ripped straight out of a video game called "Project Sylpheed: Arc of Deception" as well as a planet or two, "New Lisbon" in particular comes to mind.  As such, I can't rate this as five stars, what with all the.... unoriginality.
Lots of fun, good length!

Now there's no bug, or at least, I haven't spotted one. Nice attentions from both the dev and the author's parts. I must tip my hat off to the author; he built a high standard for himself in his previous work and in this game, he still holds up to it (and may have set it even higher), so kudos! Mecha has never been one of my favorite genre, in fact, I used to avoid it like a plague, but I come to love Mecha Ace, mainly because of its complexity and the details of each character's personality. So kudos to the author for that!
Would 5 star but you're not able to save the last page you are on. But it's fun to read though.
Good game

In the long await for Herofall, this game has certainly redeemed the COG franchise. Nice length, good replayability, and I loved the option to choose my romancable NPCs. And on that note, I love how each one of them loves or hates you based on your choices.
Awesome story and world.
Plenty long enough, many characters, character gender toggles, meaningful choices.
Wow this story is amazing! I've played it four or five times now and discover something new every time. This is a very well thought out story and I hope there's more to come!

This would be 5 stars if I were just rating the story/game. However the app itself has some issues, mainly that once I open it it drains my fully charged phone battery in 3 hrs and the only way to stop it is to force close the app or restart my phone. Also, WHAT is it doing with all that data it's burning up. It used HALF A GB before the battery died.
This game was well written and easily worth the price.
Definitely well done. I think I like the Sabres Infinity better..but its just a preference. Excellent and worth the price

As long as the app is running, foreground or background, my cell signal shows constant activity. My battery drains rapidly even when I turn off the screen until I manually kill the app. Aside from this bug, the story is actually pretty fun, the choices seem meaningful, and seemingly allows you to place your personal opinion in many conversations. That is a plus. Overall I enjoyed this story.
This game is awesome. I love it and the story kept me reading and I hope they make a sequel or something like it of Mecha Ace.
Another great game from Paul Wang. Pilot your combat armature and fight the imperial empire. Combat is fun and engaging as is the overal storyline.
Extensively thought out and extremely well made. Truly a masterpiece
Freaking fantastic cataphract

A pretty good game. You definitely feel like you are a big part of an anime mecha series but it's grounded a bit in realism. Some of the choices seem to be just railroading you though. Still a highly enjoyable game and only wished it was longer.
